short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making your workflow more seamless. Enjoy the convienence of seamless resolution conversions to real-life measurements!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A powerful Google Chrome extension designed to effortlessly convert pixel lengths to inches, centimeters, and millimeters with just a click. Whether you're a web developer, graphic designer, or simply someone who frequently deals with digital images, this handy tool streamlines your workflow by eliminating the need for manual conversions.

With Pixels, gone are the days of struggling to convert pixel dimensions to physical measurements. Simply install the extension, and it seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, ready to assist you whenever the need arises. Whether you're examining an image on a website, a design project, or a social media post, Pixels swiftly displays the corresponding measurements in inches, centimeters, and millimeters, allowing you to work with precise and accurate dimensions.

No more tedious calculations or guesswork required. Pixels takes the hassle out of converting pixel lengths and provides instant access to essential metrics, helping you save time and ensure pixel-perfect designs. Say goodbye to confusion and welcome the convenience of Pixels, the ultimate tool for effortless pixel-to-metric conversions.
